name: Hyperblack Bullets
description:
*Downloading the game is recommended for better performance and more awesomeness*

Hyperblack Bullets is a run 'n gunner with flashy, fluid combat, tight controls and a witty story. Fight a variety of enemies with multiple weapons and experiment with the unique combat system to look super cool while doing so. 

Developed by Thomas Keys. Thumbnail by Alex-musotappy@gmail.com
